thread.title: Manchester City winger Jesus Navas emerges as summer target for former club Sevilla
thread.title_full: Manchester City winger Jesus Navas emerges as summer target for former club Sevilla

author: John Cross
title: Manchester City winger Jesus Navas emerges as summer target for former club Sevilla
text:
Sport Manchester City winger Jesus Navas emerges as summer target for former club Sevilla Navas moved to Sevilla in 2013 but could be set for a return to Spain after a difficult season under Pep Guardiola Share Jesus Navas is being targeted by former club Sevilla (Photo: Clive Brunskill) Share Get football   Could   
Manchester City winger Jesus Navas is a summer target for former club Sevilla. 
Navas is out of contract this summer, has yet to be offered a new deal and is keen to return to Spain. 
Spain international Navas has also attracted interest from Valencia, but Sevilla are in pole position to re-sign a player they sold to the Blues for £15million four years ago. 
City also have full-back Bacary Sagna out of contract and he looks set to join West Ham. Midfielder Yaya Toure is also a free agent and wants to stay in England. Navas is out of contract in the summer (Photo: Cavendish Press) The Spaniard could return to Spain with Sevilla, who he left in 2013 (Photo: Shaun Botterill) 
The Blues are keeping tabs on Espanyol’s teenage left back Aaron Martín Caricol as they look to strengthen that department with Gael Clichy also set to go. 
They like Jose Luis Gaya of Valencia and also want Fulham's teenage left-back Ryan Sessegnon, who is a target for Tottenham and Liverpool too. Like us on Facebook
